 app

Detailed Description

projectIO() class

The instance of this class populates the Project menu entries with callbacks. It also modifies the state and settings objects 

Contains the callbacks associated with the entries from the Project menu:
    - new;
    - open;
    - save;
    - saveas;
    - close;
    - exit

Callback for the "New Project" menu entry

00053         """Callback for the "New Project" menu entry""" 
00054      
00055         if "NewProject.project" not in os.listdir(self.app.settings["cwd"]):
00056             ProjFolder = "NewProject.project"
00057         else:
00058             dPattern=re.compile(r'^NewProject(\d*).project$')
00059             ldirs=[s for s in os.listdir(self.app.settings["cwd"]) if os.path.isdir(s)]      # separate folders from files
00060             l=[s for s in ldirs if dPattern.search(s) is not None]              # separate folders with pattern "NewProject*.project"
00061      
00062             gldirs=[int(dPattern.search(s).groups()[0]) for s in l if (dPattern.search(s).groups())[0] is not '']
00063             if gldirs==[]: ProjFolder = "NewProject1.project"          # found "NewProject.project" in the current directory
00064             else:
00065                 DirNo=[i for i in range(1, max(gldirs)+1) if i not in gldirs]
00066                 if DirNo == []:
00067                     ProjFolder = "NewProject"+str(max(gldirs)+1)+".project" # found a sequence of "NewProject*.project" named folders
00068                 else:
